item.title: Ashley Monroe on Having ‘Tennessee Lightning’ Strike Anew, and Her Friends-Filled ‘Moth’ Video: ‘Getting Healthy Again, That Rush of Inspiration I’ve Leaned on My Whole Life Was There’
